name: Zombie Gaggle
description:
It’s only crossing the road, but can even one survive?

Help us get into the top 100 and rate our game on its GMTKJam entry page, every vote helps! https://itch.io/jam/gmtk-2019/rate/461074

Zombie Gaggle is a simple and quick puzzle game made for the GMTK Gamejam 2019.

There are 5 Levels, in each you start with control of a group of survivors that all must be moved at the same time. Your goal, get past the zombie infected road with at least one survivor left.

Controls:

Press ' R / B XBox ' to Reset \nPress 

Left Mouse Button / A XBox ' to Interact

Press ' Space / X XBox ' To Go To Next Level

For the best play experience, a gamepad is recommended.

This game was made in 14hours over the course of 2 days, the theme was ‘Only One’. When hearing the theme, I immediately went for the idea of the player controlling a crowd that would be reduced during play, like musical chairs or a kinda single player puzzle battle royal.

If you like this game let us know, comment, rate and spread the word so we can expand and do more. 

To see more of our work, and updates on the development of other future jam entries, check out these links;
